showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // Received Key Item "Huge Materia"!

ops.raw: a5 00 00 e6 fe d8 ff db 00 53 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // Aren't you the ones that stopped
the Shinra Train?{PAUSE}The Shinra was just about to destroy
our lives again

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // Hey, kid!
How about givin' somethin'
to these guys fighting'
the Shinra?

ops.raw: a5 00 00 49 ff f8 ff da 00 b6 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // It might be full of junk,
but this is the only home we got,
{Barret}!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Barret}
Ofof course!
We're all born and raised
in the coal mines!!{PAUSE}No matter how tough it gets,
our hearts burn bright red like coal!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // To you it may be a junk yard,
but to us its home.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // Must've been a horrific battle.
You have scars all over your body.{PAUSE}I already talked to the Inn's owner.
Today you can rest for free.
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // You guys are really something!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // To hell with Meteor!
We're Coal Miners, ain't we?{PAUSE}We'll dig a deep tunnel
and hide from the Meteor!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // Please buy something.
Anything!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // I got it out of the well.
Isn't it an amazing rock!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // Whoops
You can't hold any more.{PAUSE}Here, I'll keep some in my pocket
and you can come by later and
get it, OK?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // You sure are brave.
I'm impressed!

dialogStrings:
{Barret}
Ofof course!
We're all born and raised
in the coal mines!!{PAUSE}No matter how tough it gets,
our hearts burn bright red like coal!

Aren't you the ones that stopped
the Shinra Train?{PAUSE}The Shinra was just about to destroy
our lives again

Hey, kid!
How about givin' somethin'
to these guys fighting'
the Shinra?

To you it may be a junk yard,
but to us its home.

It might be full of junk,
but this is the only home we got,
{Barret}!!

Must've been a horrific battle.
You have scars all over your body.{PAUSE}I already talked to the Inn's owner.
Today you can rest for free.

To hell with Meteor!
We're Coal Miners, ain't we?{PAUSE}We'll dig a deep tunnel
and hide from the Meteor!

You sure are brave.
I'm impressed!

You'll need weapons from our store,
if you want to survive.
If you see anything you like, buy it.

I got it out of the well.
Isn't it an amazing rock!!

Whoops
You can't hold any more.{PAUSE}Here, I'll keep some in my pocket
and you can come by later and
get it, OK?
